desc: Shirakawa-cha Green Tea and Tea Leaf selects very rare and high grade Japanese green tea and Matcha made in Shirakawa-town, Gifu, Japan. Shirakawa-cha green tea shipped worldwide from Japan. Buy single estate, rare cultivar, premium green tea made with a traditional manufacturing skills and Matcha online.
